name: Olga Taylor
what_you_do: Olga S. Pérez is a life strategist, keynote speaker, entrepreneur, philanthropist and life coach.
who_you_serve: Olga has worked with people from every walk of life, including business owners, parents, couples, celebrities and artists in over six different countries.
social_proof: Olga was voted Best Life Coach in Philadelphia in 2021.
business_focus: Empowering individuals to achieve their highest self and reach for their goals.
